dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created with a procedural building generator, containing photo-realistic images where vanishing points are directly computed from CAD models of buildings. It includes 22,500 training images and 500 validation images.
dcterms:title: SU3 Wireframe

dcterms:creator: Zihan Zhou
Farshid Farhat
James Z Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of natural scenes from AVA and Flickr, specifically selected for containing only one dominating vanishing point. It consists of 2,275 images, divided into 2,000 training images and 275 test images.
dcterms:title: Natural Scene

dcterms:creator: Angela Dai

dcterms:description: A richly-annotated dataset of 3D indoor environments with reconstructed meshes and RGB images captured by mobile devices. It includes 266,844 training images.
dcterms:title: ScanNet
